features.name: Authentication & User Management
features.description: Handles user login, guest login, institution login, and overall user authentication and management.

features.name: Interview System
features.description: Core interview functionality including audio/video interviews, DSA/code interviews, streaming, and related hooks for speech processing.

features.name: Interview Results & Analysis
features.description: Displays interview performance, AI feedback, detailed insights, and specific UI for DSA/Aptitude results.

features.name: Dashboard & Admin Panels
features.description: Provides user dashboard, admin functionalities, and super-admin controls.

features.name: Course & Batch Management
features.description: Manages course content, user batches, and scheduling of interviews for institutions.

features.name: UI Components & Utilities
features.description: Reusable UI components, hooks, and utility functions used throughout the application.

features.name: Credit Management
features.description: Manages user credits for interviews and other services.
